statements: SELECT * FROM CouponCodes ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM CouponCodes WHERE usage_count > 5;
SELECT coupon_id, expiration_date, discount_amount FROM CouponCodes WHERE promotion_name LIKE 'Summer%';
SELECT * FROM CouponCodes WHERE discount_amount >= 10 ORDER BY discount_amount ASC, expiration_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, usage_count FROM CouponCodes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM CouponCodes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM CouponCodes WHERE usage_count > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT coupon_id, promotion_name, expiration_date FROM CouponCodes WHERE discount_amount >= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM CouponCodes WHERE discount_amount < 20.00 AND usage_count >= 5 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;

SELECT coupon_id, promotion_name, discount_amount, expiration_date, usage_count FROM CouponCodes WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND discount_amount BETWEEN 30.00 AND 70.00 ORDER BY discount_amount ASC, promotion_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM coupon_codes WHERE coupon_id = 1;
SELECT coupon_code, promotion_id FROM coupon_codes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT coupon_id, coupon_code, promotion_id, expiration_date FROM coupon_codes WHERE promotion_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM coupon_codes WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-10-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT coupon_code, end_date FROM coupon_codes INNER JOIN promotions ON coupon_codes.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE promotions.discount_amount > 50.00;
SELECT coupon_code, promotion_name, expiration_date FROM coupon_codes INNER JOIN promotions ON coupon_codes.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE coupon_codes.expiration_date < '2022-09-30';
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, discount_amount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount >= 25.00 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM coupons;
SELECT coupon_id, coupon_code, discount, expiration_date FROM coupons WHERE discount > 0.5;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT coupon_code, expiration_date FROM coupons WHERE coupon_id = 3;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount >= 50;
SELECT * FROM coupons WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE coupon_used IS NOT NULL AND promotion_used IS NOT NULL AND sale_amount > 50 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM coupons c JOIN sales s ON c.coupon_id = s.coupon_used WHERE s.customer_id = 12345;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM promotions p JOIN sales s ON p.promotion_id = s.promotion_used WHERE s.sale_amount > 100 AND s.customer_id = 54321 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM coupon_codes;
SELECT code, discount FROM coupon_codes ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT code, discount, expiration_date FROM coupon_codes WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT sale_id, total_amount FROM sales WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM coupon_codes ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, discount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT code, discount FROM coupon_codes WHERE discount > 0.5 ORDER BY code ASC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY promotion_name;

SELECT c.code, u.user_id, u.usage_date FROM coupon_usage u INNER JOIN coupon_codes c ON u.code_id = c.code_id WHERE u.usage_date >= '2022-01-01' AND u.usage_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY u.usage_date DESC;

SELECT s.sale_id, s.total_amount, p.promotion_name, s.sale_date FROM sales s INNER JOIN promotions p ON s.promotion_id = p.promotion_id WHERE s.total_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY s.total_amount DESC, s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Coupons WHERE discount_amount > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT coupon_code, discount_amount FROM Coupons WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotions ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 'abc123'
SELECT * FROM Coupons WHERE discount_amount > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT coupon_code, discount_amount FROM Coupons WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND expiration_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
